name: Hands of the Reel
description:
Hands of the Reel is A randomly generated isometric bullet-hell where you control a character  (cornet) and their shadow.  The goal of the game is to try and stay alive for as long as you can.

Credits:
Jasper Frank
Joe James
Sebastion Jennings



Link to the GGJ Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/rubber-shadow-5
